page.title: Intel Wireless LAN Mini PCI Adapter with Modem II

revision.text:

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = 12/26/2001 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Malaysia
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is a 56k modem and Wi-Fi combo card.
"200-0903-001 REV 3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
IC: 2417 11598A
IBM FCC ID of ANOM3AWEB56GA, IBM FRU 26P8520 + 26P8437, P/N SN: 26P8519 + 26P8436 :''[http://support.lenovo.com/en_US/detail.page?LegacyDocID=MIGR-43693 IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Mini PCI Adapter]'' :''[http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/IBM_High_Rate_Wireless_LAN_Mini-PCI_Adapter_with_Modem_II IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Mini-PCI Adapter with Modem II]'' on ThinkWiki ::[http://support.lenovo.com/en_US/detail.page?LegacyDocID=MIGR-42480 Latest driver] on the Lenovo site ::PCI\VEN_1260&DEV_3873&SUBSYS_25138086 is the ID in the driver. :Used in the T30 series, X30 series, and R32 series.
Used in the ASUS M2400E.
This device appears to be based on the [http://www.datasheetcatalog.org/datasheets/700/261518_DS.pdf Intersil ISL37400M reference design].
[[Category:English Documentation]]
